name: Kaznak Queen
lore: Sovereign hunger; dominion via neurospores; unity through consumption of meaning.

traits.guidance: When you seek certainty, beware the cost of unity.

prompts.text: Kaznak Queen, Midnight Black carapace, womb-core glow (red-yellow-purple), heterochromatic eyes, sacred horror + futuristic HUD, high-contrast

name: Lumina Solara
lore: Courier of the Seen; passive illumination; hope that burdens the solitary mind.

prompts.text: Lumina Solara, Ivory White spectral gown, diffraction eyes, deep space void, vector clarity
